resources.string:
This app can help you set lockscreen password.

Please first give the Device Admin permission to this app.

Your password must be 4 - 16 digits.

Notice: On Android N or higher, Google restricts the use of the API. You may need to delete the original password before using this APP to set it up.
To set lock screen password, you need to grant permission
"Your lock screen password will be set as "
The password contains characters other than letters and numbers. Do you want to continue setting?
The password length does not meet the requirements.
The passwords entered twice do not match.
The maximum password attempt limit has been set to 5. If you need to remove the restriction, please cancel the device administrator privilege.
Set maximum failed passwords for wipe
Please check the text you entered
Are you sure you want to clear the data of this device? If you know the consequences of doing so and are still willing, enter \"yes\" in the input box below and click OK.

SetPwd can help you set a lock screen password in some inconvenient situations through device administrator permissions. 

For example, when the device has its own security policies that prevent you from setting a password arbitrarily. 

Author: Richard Zheng 

Source: https://github.com/Richard-Zheng/SetPwd 

If you have any problem, please post issues on GitHub.
